trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around September 19th 2009
Summary: Burst of cone shaped light with afterglow.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were outside at 7:50pm EST and my daughter said "what is that in the sky?" A cone shaped light was shining down. It looked like a large spotlight shining down but to high in the sky and too bright to be a helicopter. We are in rural area. It grew in size and intensity and then the source at the top of the cone went out. There was a glowing haze that lingered for 15-20 seconds. Clear and not a cloud in the sky, and no fog in the area. It was bizarre and amazing. I felt like we were seeing something incredible.
